TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StaticExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现返回静态字段和属性引用的标记扩展。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that returns static field and property references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是用于标记扩展实现`{x:Static}`中.NET XAML 服务 XAML 语言功能的支持。This class is a markup extension implementation for `{x:Static}` in the .NET XAML services support of XAML language features. XAML 使用情况信息，请参阅[X:static 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md). 通常使用静态引用类型，包括从类型不能进行实例化在 XAML 中静态类型是从获取静态值。You typically use static references to obtain static values from types, including from types that cannot be instantiated in XAML because the type is static. 常见示例的情况下其中`{x:Static}`可包括的可视为常量，如固定的数学值或状态的唯一键的值。Common examples of cases where `{x:Static}` is useful include values that can be thought of as constants, such as fixed math values or unique keys for states. 所引用的静态成员不需要来自与 XAML 架构上下文关联的特定框架程序集。The static members being referenced do not have to come from specific framework assemblies associated with XAML schema context. 您可以映射其他程序集和 CLR 命名空间的 XAML 用法，并可以参阅中使用映射的前缀的 XAML 类型的静态成员。You can map other assemblies and CLR namespaces for XAML usage and then can refer to static members of types in XAML using the prefix you mapped.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string member) cil managed

param.name: member
param.span: 用于标识要引用的成员的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the member to make a reference to.

param.span: 此字符串使用格式 prefix:typeName.fieldOrPropertyName。

span.span: This string uses the format prefix:typeName.fieldOrPropertyName.

param.span: prefix 是 XAML 命名空间的映射前缀，并且仅用于未映射到默认 XAML 命名空间的引用静态值。

span.span: prefix is the mapping prefix for a XAML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XAML namespace.

summary.span: 使用提供的 字符串初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `member`时将其设置未计算值。The `member` value is not evaluated when you set it. 如果不是初始值`null`，然后接受的值。If the initial value is not `null`,then the value is accepted. 实际分析和计算`member`值将延迟，直到当 XAML 编写器处理的扩展用法时调用。The actual parsing and evaluation of the `member` value is deferred until is called when a XAML writer processes an extension usage. 该时间、 XAML 架构上下文将通知的类型映射和可以获取的值。At that time, XAML schema context informs the type mapping and the value can be obtained.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Member { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Member : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于根据服务提供的类型解析程序解析静态字段或属性的成员名称字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a member name string that is used to resolve a static field or property based on the service-provided type resolver.

value.span: 用于标识要引用的成员的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the member to make a reference to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串通常使用格式*前缀*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*。The string for typically uses the format *prefix*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*. (*前缀*是 XML 命名空间，映射前缀，并且只需引用未映射到默认 XML 命名空间的静态值)。(*prefix* is the mapping prefix for an XML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XML namespace). 字符串还可以指定唯一成员名称，只要为还提供。，但请注意，此方法将不支持 XML 命名空间和前缀; 它在类型系统级别上工作。The string can also specify only the member name, so long as is also supplied., but note that this technique will not support XML namespaces and prefixes; it is working at the type system level. XAML 使用情况信息，请参阅[X:static 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md). 在设置它; 时，则不会计算此值只要值不是`null`将会接受它。This value is not evaluated when you set it; so long as the value is not `null` it will be accepted. 实际分析和的值计算将推迟至在分析过程中调用。The actual parsing and evaluation of the value is deferred until is called during parsing. 使用正常情况下下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]XAML 处理器，XAML 处理器将 CLR 类型作为其服务协定的一部分传递类型解析程序和在使用此冲突解决程序调用。Under the normal scenario of use by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor, the XAML processor passes a type resolver for CLR types as part of its service contract, and this resolver is used on the call.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于定义要返回的静态成员的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that defines the static member to return.

value.span: 用于定义要返回的静态成员的 。

span.span: The that defines the static member to return.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，支持备用模式，它可以返回基于某个静态成员正在简单成员名称和作为提供其所属类型，而非提供窗体中的完整名称*类型*`.`*成员*。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], supports an alternate mode whereby it can return a static member based on being the simple member name and its owning type supplied as , rather than providing a full name in the form *type*`.`*member*. 类型解析程序仍然有效，但在这种情况下并基本上组合： `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`。The type resolver still acts, but in this case the and are basically combined: `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`. 请注意，此方法将不支持 XAML 命名空间和前缀;它正在针对后备类型系统不是 XAML 类型系统。Note that this technique will not support XAML namespaces and prefixes; it is working against the backing type system, not the XAML type system. 字符串通常使用格式*前缀*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*。The string for typically uses the format *prefix*`:`*typeName*`.`*fieldOrPropertyName*. (*前缀*是 XML 命名空间，映射前缀，并且只需引用未映射到默认 XML 命名空间的静态值)。(*prefix* is the mapping prefix for an XML namespace, and is only required to reference static values that are not mapped to the default XML namespace). XAML 使用情况信息，请参阅[X:static 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可为标记扩展提供服务的对象。

span.span: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.

param.span: 服务提供程序应提供实现类型解析程序 () 的服务。

span.span: The service provider is expected to provide a service that implements a type resolver ().

summary.span: 返回一个要在应用此扩展的属性上设置的对象值。

span.span: Returns an object value to set on the property where you apply this extension.

summary.span: 对于 ，返回值是为所请求的静态成员计算的静态值。

span.span: For , the return value is the static value that is evaluated for the requested static member.

returns.span: 要在应用了扩展的属性上设置的静态值。

span.span: The static value to set on the property where the extension is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 XAML 语言功能，通常不应直接调用。This method supports XAML language features and is generally not intended to be called directly. XAML 处理器实现使用此方法来正确处理`x:Static`对象创建期间的扩展值。The XAML processor implementation uses this method to correctly handle the `x:Static` extension values during object creation. 此实现依赖于服务基于已传递的`serviceProvider`。This implementation relies on services that are based on the passed `serviceProvider`. `serviceProvider` 不能`null`。`serviceProvider` must not be `null`. `serviceProvider`对象应返回的服务。The `serviceProvider` object is expected to return a service for . 使用由默认 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器正常情况下，在合适的服务提供程序不可用。Under the normal scenario of use by the default XAML readers and XAML writers, a suitable service provider is available. 无效的 XAML 架构上下文可能具有的类型映射的重大副作用，因此服务。An invalid XAML schema context might have the side effect of breaking type mapping and thus the service. 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，支持备用模式，它可以返回基于某个静态成员正在简单成员名称和作为提供其所属类型，而非提供窗体中的完整名称*类型*`.`*成员*。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], supports an alternate mode whereby it can return a static member based on being the simple member name and its owning type supplied as , rather than providing a full name in the form *type*`.`*member*. 类型解析程序仍然有效，但在这种情况下并基本上组合： `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`。The type resolver still acts, but in this case the and are basically combined: `memberFullName = MemberType.FullName + "." + Member`.
